thread.title: Man United FC news: Jose Mourinho has given Red Devils a ‘winning mentality’, says Jesse Lingard | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man United FC news: Jose Mourinho has given Red Devils a ‘winning mentality’, says Jesse Lingard | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man United FC news: Jose Mourinho has given Red Devils a ‘winning mentality’, says Jesse Lingard | Metro News
text:
Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Sunday 12 Feb 2017 6:51 pm Jesse Lingard has revealed how competitive the Manchester United squad is (Picture: Getty) 
Jesse Lingard has revealed the Manchester United squad has become so competitive under Jose Mourinho that even losing in training effects the players’ mood. 
The Red Devils are enjoying a fantastic run under Mourinho and have not lost a Premier League game since October. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
After an indifferent start to the campaign United have now made up substantial ground on the top-four and are potentially one win away from claiming second place. 
The club remain in the hunt for three trophies and Lingard, 23, insists the squad are desperate to prove their worth to Mourinho. 
‘Training has more edge to it,’ England winger Lingard, who has made 13 starts for the club this term, told the Sunday Times. 
‘Everyone wants to win. It doesn’t matter the competition, we go in with a winning mentality. Manchester United fixtures 
St-Etienne – Europa (H) Thu 16 Feb Blackburn – FA Cup (A) – Sat 18 Feb St-Etienne – Europa (A) – Wed 22 Feb Southampton – EFL (N) – Sun 26 Feb Bournemouth (H) – Sat 4 Mar Southampton (A) – Sun 12 Mar Jose Mourinho has been pleased by his side’s progression this term (Picture: Getty) 
‘When you lose a training game you’re down all day and getting wound by by the other team.’
